translation.en: I've flown with the Great Condor!
-I can't believe it! -He's gonna ruin everything!
translation.zh: ‎简直不可理喻！ ‎他会把一切都毁掉的！

translation.en: -I have a feather from the Great Condor! -Stop it! You're frightening them!
translation.zh: ‎我拿到了一根神鹰的羽毛！ ‎别闹了！你吓到它们了

translation.en: You can be such a pain.
-Go play somewhere else. -I've flown with the Great Condor!
translation.zh: ‎去别的地方玩儿去 ‎我刚驾着神鹰飞了一圈！

translation.en: Only the mountain wind may enter my house without being invited.
translation.zh: ‎只有山间的风 ‎才能不请自来地进入我家

translation.en: But, Shaman... I flew with the Great Condor! Look!
translation.zh: ‎可是萨满 我刚驾着神鹰飞了一圈！ ‎快看！

translation.en: You flew with the Great Condor?
Am I a shaman now, Shaman?
translation.zh: ‎萨满 我现在是萨满了吗？

translation.en: Do you believe a feather is enough to make a shaman out of you?
translation.zh: ‎你以为凭一根羽毛就能当萨满了吗？

translation.en: Your time would be better spent thinking
translation.zh: ‎你有这个闲工夫 还不如好好想想

translation.en: about what you plan to offer to Pachamama tomorrow.
You know your offering must be your most precious treasure.
translation.zh: ‎要知道 你必须献上你最珍贵的宝物
‎土豆是怎么来的 瓦鲁嬷嬷？

translation.en: Now, this is a very good question.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 这个问题提得非常好

translation.en: Let us see if Naïra here can answer it for us,
translation.zh: ‎我们看看奈拉能否为我们解答

translation.en: since she will soon become a Great One.
translation.zh: ‎因为她很快就会成为一名达人了

translation.en: First they appear as little, tiny seeds.
translation.zh: ‎一开始 它们只是一颗颗细小的种子

translation.en: Pachamama buries them in her belly.
translation.zh: ‎大地母亲将它们埋进她的肚子里

translation.en: She nourishes and protects them until the harvest season.
translation.zh: ‎她滋养并保护着它们 直到丰收季节

translation.en: Just like a mother does with her baby.
translation.zh: ‎就像母亲对待她的孩子一样

translation.en: We are all children of Pachamama.
That is why we must love her as much as she loves us.
translation.zh: ‎因此 我们要像她爱我们一样爱她

translation.en: Tell us how we shall show our gratitude
translation.zh: ‎跟我们说说我们要如何感谢大地母亲

translation.en: to Pachamama for this abundant crop.
translation.zh: ‎跟我们说说我们要如何感谢大地母亲 ‎给我们带来大丰收

translation.en: I'll make my first offering, and so will Naïra.
translation.zh: ‎我将首次进行献礼 奈拉也是

translation.en: And bang, after that, we become Great Ones, and that's it.
translation.zh: ‎然后我们会摇身一变 成为达人 ‎就这么简单

translation.en: -I'm dreaming. -You're not sleeping, but you're dreaming?
translation.zh: ‎我在做梦 ‎你都没有睡着 怎么做梦？

translation.en: -That way, I can have any dream I want. -And what are you dreaming about?
translation.zh: ‎这样 我可以随心所欲地做梦 ‎那你在做什么梦呢？

translation.en: Mama Quilla is now high in the sky.
What are you gonna ask from Pachamama tomorrow?
translation.zh: ‎你明天准备向大地母亲许什么愿？

translation.en: You didn't get it, did you?
You know everything, don't you, Miss Perfect?
translation.zh: ‎就你什么都懂 是吧？模范乖乖女

translation.en: The snakes are the keepers of our cave.
They can recognize who is ready to appear before our ancestors.
translation.zh: ‎它们能洞悉谁具备了面见祖先的条件

translation.en: Beloved ancestors, I come to disturb your peaceful rest
translation.zh: ‎各位敬爱的祖先 ‎我在此打扰您们安息

translation.en: only to ask you to entrust me with the huaca.
translation.zh: ‎是为了请求您们将圣物交付于我

translation.en: Thank you, ancestors, for your kindness.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢您们的善心 各位祖先

translation.en: I will return it after the ceremony.
Thank you, Mama Quilla, for illuminating our cave.
translation.zh: ‎月亮母亲 谢谢您照亮我们的洞穴

translation.en: Your children are all gathered here
to honor and thank you for this harvest.
translation.zh: ‎向您赐予的丰收表示致敬和感谢

translation.en: Our ancestors shaped her and placed within her
translation.zh:
‎这是我们祖先亲手打造的雕像
‎并在其中装入了

translation.en: we return to you all that which you have given to us.
translation.zh: ‎我们现将您赐予我们的一切回馈给您

translation.en: May these offerings feed your belly.
Naïra and Tepulpaï have grown strong and healthy thanks to you.
translation.zh:
‎托您的福
‎奈拉和特普尔派得以茁壮健康地长大

translation.en: The time has come for them to make their first offering
as a token of gratitude to you.
you must offer to Pachamama the most precious thing you have.
translation.zh: ‎你必须献给大地母亲你最珍贵的东西

translation.en: But this is all I have.
translation.zh: ‎可除了这个 我没别的了

translation.en: I have a feeling you can do better.
translation.zh: ‎我的直觉告诉我 你还能献上更好的

translation.en: It'll have to wait until the next harvest.
translation.zh: ‎需要等到下一个丰收季才行

translation.en: Tepulpaï is not a Great One yet!
She's the most precious thing I have.
translation.zh: ‎她是我拥有的最宝贵的东西

translation.en: Must the blood of this llama be shed?
translation.zh: ‎这头骆马一定要以鲜血为您献礼吗？

translation.en: that she is shedding her own tears
Sorry. I took you for a stone.
We barely finished picking our crops.
It's the Great Collector of the Great Inca.
May our sun god, Inti, illuminate all of you,
translation.zh: ‎愿我们的太阳神因蒂照耀你们每个人

translation.en: and woe to the thief, the liar...
I come to collect that which is due to his son, the Great Inca.
translation.zh: ‎我前来替太阳神之子印加大帝收税

translation.en: and we had an abundant harvest.
What? You have thrown all that away?
translation.zh: ‎什么？你们把这些全扔掉不要了？

translation.en: -What a waste! -We did not throw it away.
Whatever we give to Pachamama comes back to us.
translation.zh:
‎我们赠予大地母亲的一切
‎都会得到回馈

translation.en: Here is the portion we have set aside for you.
Who are you to decide what is due to the Great Inca?
translation.zh:
‎你们算哪根葱？
‎竟敢决定哪些归印加大帝所有？

translation.en: You must give as many bags as there are knots in my quipu,
translation.zh:
‎你们献上的粮袋
‎必须像我绳上的结那么多

translation.en: -No one can be worse than these Incas! -They're taking away all our crops.
translation.zh: ‎这些印加人真是可恶至极 ‎他们把我们的庄稼全拿走了

translation.en: We'll have nothing left to eat.
We're lucky they can't take our fields away.
translation.zh: ‎他们搬不走我们的田地已是万幸了

translation.en: but you chose to dump everything down into that hole.
translation.zh: ‎但你们偏要什么都往那个洞里倒

translation.en: You wretched peasants are too generous with your Pachamama.
translation.zh:
‎你们这些苦命的农民
‎对你们的大地母亲太慷慨了

translation.en: They are offerings so that she might protect our village.
translation.zh: ‎那些是祈求她保佑村庄的献礼

translation.en: The only one who protects you is the Great Inca!
translation.zh: ‎印加大帝才是你们唯一的保护者

translation.en: He builds the roads and illuminates the world!
translation.zh: ‎是他修砌道路 给世界以光明！

translation.en: This statuette makes you all stupid. I am confiscating it.
translation.zh:
‎这个小雕像让你们个个愚昧 ‎-我就此没收了
‎-不！

translation.en: I will offer it to the Great Inca as a sign of submission from your village.
translation.zh: ‎我会将此献给印加大帝 ‎作为你们村庄臣服的象征

translation.en: Let's go attack them by surprise and squish them!
translation.zh: ‎我们去突袭他们 把他们消灭干净！

translation.en: Vengeance is not in the spirit of the Condor.
But we can't just sit around and do nothing!
translation.zh: ‎但我们不能就这么坐视不管啊

translation.en: We have to get the huaca back!
I will see to that. As soon as Walumama no longer needs my care.
translation.zh:
‎等瓦鲁嬷嬷不再需要我的照顾
‎我会负责此事

translation.en: But, Shaman, if we wait too long, we'll never catch them.
translation.zh: ‎可是萨满 ‎再等下去我们就赶不上他们了

translation.en: They'll get to Cusco and give the huaca to the Great Inca.
translation.zh: ‎他们会去库斯科 将圣物献给大帝

translation.en: Can't you just listen to the shaman without arguing for a change?
translation.zh: ‎你能不能听听萨满的话 别老顶嘴？
‎我有问你吗 模范乖乖女？

translation.en: Listen to the shaman, will you?
You're back. So you're not mad at me, after all?
translation.zh: ‎你回来了 ‎所以你不生我的气了？

translation.en: Come on. I'll show the shaman what I'm capable of.
translation.zh: ‎走 我要让萨满见识见识我的厉害

translation.en: Lucky you. You can eat whatever you find.
translation.zh: ‎你命真好 可以捡到什么就吃什么

translation.en: Got any food or drink for me?
No way. I'm not carrying you. I'm tired.
translation.zh: ‎没门儿 我才不抱着你走呢 ‎我累了

translation.en: I'm coming with you, and so is Lamita.
translation.zh: ‎我要和你一起去 拉米塔也是

translation.en: The shaman sent you to spy on me, right?
translation.zh: ‎是萨满让你来监视我的 对吧？

translation.en: He did not. He doesn't even know I'm here.
translation.zh: ‎才不是呢 他根本不知道我在这儿

translation.en: I see. So, now Miss Perfect is disobeying the shaman.
translation.zh: ‎这样啊 ‎模范乖乖女竟然忤逆萨满

translation.en: Someone must bring the huaca back to the village.
translation.zh: ‎总要有人让圣物重回村庄吧

translation.en: Kirkincho and I, we don't need any help.
translation.zh: ‎我和小犰狳不需要任何帮助

translation.en: See? You're such a coward, you can't even cross the bridge.
translation.zh: ‎瞧？你胆子那么小 ‎连桥都不敢过

translation.en: -Go back to the village! -We're coming with you.
translation.zh: ‎回村里去吧！ ‎我们要跟着你 你阻止不了的
‎我们要跟着你 你阻止不了的 ‎我才不要！

translation.en: You'll slow us down. I don't need you.
translation.zh: ‎你们会拖累我们 我不需要你们

translation.en: We didn't walk all this way for nothing.
translation.zh: ‎我们不是吃饱了没事干才跟来的

translation.en: And don't tell me you don't need this.
for feeding us and giving us strength for this journey.
translation.zh: ‎在征程中给我们食物和力量

translation.en: Right. We have no time for ceremony.
The Incas aren't gonna wait for us.
and I bring the huaca back to the village.
Talking is not gonna help us catch up with the Incas.
translation.zh: ‎耍嘴皮子对追上印加人毫无帮助

translation.en: Make way for the chasqui of the Inca!
translation.zh: ‎印加信使在此 见者让路！

translation.en: Look at those stars above our village.
They're the stars of the Great Condor.
You know, I can't stop thinking about Walumama.
translation.zh: ‎不瞒你说 我一直记挂着瓦鲁嬷嬷

translation.en: She was so ill when I left the village.
translation.zh: ‎我离开村庄时 她病得很重

translation.en: I'm sure the shaman will heal her.
And what if we don't find our huaca?
One of the stars is dancing.
Let's take advantage of the night to find the Incas.
translation.zh: ‎我们趁着天黑赶路 追上印加人

translation.en: They've gone into the sea of clouds.
There's so many of them. They're stronger, and they've got weapons.
translation.zh: ‎他们人多势众 ‎比我们更强壮 还有武器

translation.en: How are we gonna do this?
We'll just come from behind. Quiet and slow.
translation.zh: ‎我们从后面突袭 悄悄地 慢慢地

translation.en: They won't see us with all these clouds.
translation.zh: ‎云雾这么厚 他们看不见我们

translation.en: The Incas are so loud. We can't miss them.
translation.zh: ‎印加人动静那么大 ‎我们一定会找到他们

translation.en: We must stick to the trail.
Thank you, Lamita. We're so lucky you're here.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 拉米塔 ‎幸好有你在

translation.en: Walumama always says that whenever you're scared,
translation.zh: ‎瓦鲁嬷嬷总是说 ‎每当你害怕的时候

translation.en: you should breathe deeply to remind yourself that you're alive.
translation.zh: ‎你需要深呼吸 提醒自己你还活着

translation.en: I think I stepped on a...
Yes! I know how to find the Incas.
translation.zh: ‎对了！ ‎我知道怎么找到印加人了
‎跟着他们骆马的大便走就好了

translation.en: I hate the Incas... and their llamas!
translation.zh: ‎我讨厌印加人 也讨厌他们的骆马！
‎我们来晚了 他们已经到了

translation.en: They're going to meet with the great Inca.
We're not just going to jump into the mouth of the Puma.
translation.zh: ‎我们不能明知山有虎 偏向虎山行啊

translation.en: I told you that it wouldn't be easy. No one forced you to come.
translation.zh: ‎我早说过一路会很艰险 ‎又没有人逼着你来

translation.en: May I remind you that, without us,
translation.zh: ‎我可得提醒你 要不是有我们

translation.en: you would have fallen down and broken your neck in that sea of clouds.
translation.zh:
‎你早就在云海中坠入深渊
‎摔断脖子了

translation.en: You should think twice before making decisions.
We are never gonna get our huaca back just by think twicing.
translation.zh: ‎光靠“三思” 我们永远无法夺回圣物

translation.en: Make way for the... chasqui of the Inca.
translation.zh: ‎印加信使… ‎在此 见者让路

translation.en: I've come from the shore with a message for the Great Inca.
translation.zh: ‎我从海岸边赶来 ‎有重要情报要告知印加大帝

translation.en: A floating house has arrived on the waters.
translation.zh: ‎一座会漂浮的大房子漂洋过海而来
‎是一群身披金属皮肤的怪物

‎所以我们必须… ‎-必须…
‎-必须什么？

translation.en: We must deliver the message to the Great Inca.
translation.zh: ‎我们必须将情报传给印加大帝

translation.en: Isn't that what a chasqui's supposed to do?
translation.zh: ‎这难道不就是信使的本职工作吗？

translation.en: I think he's gone to meet his ancestors.
translation.zh: ‎看来他…去和逝去的祖先团聚了

translation.en: Those gods are really... mighty gods.
So if the Great Inca needs to hear this message, right?
translation.zh: ‎既然印加大帝需要知晓这条情报

translation.en: And we need to get our huaca back... can't we make some kind of trade?
translation.zh: ‎我们又需要夺回圣物… ‎我们能和他做个交易吗？

translation.en: Now, that, Naïra, that is some great think twicing.
translation.zh: ‎哇 奈拉 ‎你的“三思”果然了得

translation.en: He's come all that way to deliver this message.
So now, it's up to us to finish his mission.
translation.zh: ‎所以我们要完成他的遗志才行

translation.en: We won't let you down, brave chasqui. You'll be proud of us.
translation.zh: ‎勇敢的信使 我们不会让你失望 ‎你将以我们为傲
‎来吧 ‎我们得抓紧了 奈拉

translation.en: They're not real pumas. They're just Inca guards.
translation.zh: ‎他们不是真的山狮 只是印加侍卫

translation.en: Don't show them we're afraid, or else they won't let us through.
translation.zh: ‎别让他们看出我们的胆怯 ‎否则他们不会放我们通行

translation.en: May our god Inti illuminate you, travelers,
translation.zh: ‎愿我们的太阳神因蒂为旅人照亮前程

translation.en: and may the thief, the liar, and the lazy man be punished.
translation.zh: ‎并惩罚偷盗、欺骗以及懒惰之辈

translation.en: Fresh fish for the Great Inca!
translation.zh: ‎这是献给印加大帝的新鲜活鱼！

translation.en: They are on their way to see the Great Inca.
Wow! The Temple of the Sun.
That is a very high house.
It's high enough to be closer to his father, Inti.
translation.zh: ‎这样才能接近他的父亲 太阳神因蒂

translation.en: all those stairs to get up there!
Besides, they say he never touches the ground.
translation.zh: ‎再说了 据说他向来脚不沾地

translation.en: Make way for the chasquis of the Inca!
translation.zh: ‎印加信使在此 见者让路！

translation.en: If you're a chasqui, then I'm a llama.
translation.zh: ‎你要是信使 我就是头骆马

translation.en: He claims to be a chasqui?
Any chasqui who blows into the pututu may enter the temple,
translation.zh: ‎任何吹响螺号的信使都有权进入庙内

translation.en: Great Inca, here is some medicine prepared by our shaman
translation.zh:
‎印加大帝
‎这是由我们萨满准备的一些药材

translation.en: from the bark and roots of the Kuntisuyu, a plant found in our village.
translation.zh: ‎原料是孔蒂苏尤的树皮和根茎 ‎是我们村庄的特有植物

translation.en: Interesting. Give it to the llamas of the Inca.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 有意思 ‎将它喂给印加帝国的骆马吃吧

translation.en: Great Inca, our people, the Kollasuyo,
translation.zh: ‎印加大帝 我们的族人科利亚苏尤

translation.en: have crafted for you this cloak,
translation.zh: ‎用世间稀有的白山鲁塔鸟羽毛

translation.en: with the feathers of the rare luta bird from the White Mountains.
A rare bird that gets so easily caught has no glamour.
translation.zh: ‎这么容易捉到的稀有鸟类毫无贵气

translation.en: This cloak is not a cloak,
He's being carried on some sort of tray by servants.
translation.zh: ‎他坐在仆人抬起的托盘一样的东西上

translation.en: Great Inca, we have walked all the way from the riverbanks
translation.zh: ‎印加大帝 我们从河边一路走来

translation.en: to bring you this basket of fresh fish.
translation.zh: ‎只为了向您献上这筐新鲜的活鱼

translation.en: Not in the mood for fish.
we have run nine suns nonstop and--
Accept this offering from a remote village.
translation.zh: ‎请您收下一座偏僻村庄的献礼

translation.en: Its people wish to express their deep gratitude
translation.zh: ‎那里的人民想对您广阔无边的保佑

translation.en: and are now entirely devoted to Inti,
translation.zh: ‎并会彻底臣服于太阳神因蒂

translation.en: -I'll have a word with this Great Inca. -No, wait. Let me handle it.
translation.zh: ‎我要和印加大帝好好理论一番！ ‎不 等等 交给我吧

translation.en: Make way for the chasquis of the Inca!
translation.zh: ‎印加信使在此 见者让路！

translation.en: These are some very tiny chasquis.
translation.zh: ‎这俩信使的个头也太小了吧

translation.en: we bring you a very big...
translation.zh: ‎我们为您带来了一个很大的…

translation.en: As big as you, no doubt.
translation.zh: ‎想必和你们的个子一样大吧

translation.en: Just as soon as Your Lightness agrees to repair a great injustice.
translation.zh: ‎只要您…陛下您 ‎同意为我们伸张正义 我们就说

translation.en: How dare you address the Son of the Sun with such arrogance?
translation.zh: ‎你竟然敢对太阳之子如此无礼？
‎你真是很有胆量啊 小信使

translation.en: Your great collector here stole this huaca.
translation.zh: ‎您的这位税收总管盗取了这尊圣物

translation.en: You must give it back to us.
The peasants in that village are nothing but a lazy lot.
translation.zh: ‎那村庄里的农民全是懒惰之辈

translation.en: I already have a whole room filled with these trinkets,
translation.zh: ‎我的房间已经堆满了这种小玩意儿

translation.en: bigger and fancier than this one.
translation.zh: ‎而且比这个还要大 还要华丽

translation.en: Now, return this thing to the tiny chasqui.
translation.zh: ‎我命令你 将东西归还给小信使

translation.en: Now, let me have my message.
Many metal gods have arrived on Mama Cocha, our mother sea.
translation.zh:
‎一大批身披金属的神明
‎抵达了我们海洋母亲的领地
‎他们乘着一座超大的会漂浮的房子

translation.en: spitting fire... and burying everything in their path.
translation.zh: ‎会喷火 他们所到之处 一切都被掩埋

translation.en: And they will destroy the Incas.
The Great Inca is about to fall!
Woe to the world if he touches the ground.
translation.zh: ‎他要是沾到地面 可就有大灾大难了
‎不 这又是那老掉牙的故事！

translation.en: I don't ever want to hear about those so-called metal gods again.
translation.zh:
‎我再也不想听到
‎那些所谓金属神明的事了

translation.en: No one can destroy the son of Inti!
Throw these tiny liars into the dungeon.
translation.zh: ‎把这两个骗人的小不点拖入地牢

translation.en: The pumas will shut them up!
May the Great Condor strike you
and throw you out of your stupid tray!
translation.zh: ‎让你从那愚蠢的托盘上摔下来
‎哦 我的身体触到地面了！

translation.en: The chasquis were telling the truth!

translation.zh: ‎这些神明的打扮还挺奇怪的

translation.en: -They're monsters! -It's not funny. I want them to stop.
translation.zh: ‎他们是恶魔！ ‎这一点不好笑 我想让他们住手！
‎哦 快住手 求你们了

translation.en: No! It contains our most sacred treasure!
translation.zh: ‎不行！里面有我们最为神圣的宝物！
‎可这是神圣之物 不要啊！

translation.en: Don't worry, Naïra. She will find her way back to the village.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 奈拉 ‎她会找到回村庄的路的
‎哦 糟了 圣物有裂缝了！

translation.en: Listen! That's condor feathers in there.
Here, run and bring the huaca back to the village.
translation.zh: ‎给 你赶紧逃 将圣物带回村庄

translation.en: You know, I'm glad to have you as a friend.
translation.zh: ‎你知道吗？有你这个朋友真好

translation.en: Now we've gotta get out of here and fast.
Naïra and Lamita need us. Do you smell something?
translation.zh: ‎奈拉和拉米塔需要我们 ‎你闻到什么了吗？

translation.en: We don't want the pumas to catch us.
translation.zh: ‎要是被山狮侍卫抓住就糟了

translation.en: With you, it's always eat, eat, eat.
You're facing the power of the Great Condor!
This puma is the sun of my night.
And what is your name, little one?

translation.zh: ‎特普尔派 我可不是小朋友

translation.en: I need to get out of this place as fast as possible
to go find my friend Naïra.
The men of metal are chasing her, and they want to steal--
translation.zh: ‎一群身披金属的人正在追她 想要偷…

translation.en: They are the ones who make the ground tremble.
I saw them in the stars a long time ago.
translation.zh: ‎很久以前 我就在星相里看到他们了

translation.en: Men of metal, with hair on their chins,
translation.zh: ‎一群身披金属 下巴长毛的人

translation.en: And I know what they're capable of.
Oh, so you're the Great Observer.
translation.zh: ‎哦 原来你就是占星大师

translation.en: Well, the Great Inca said you were a liar.
translation.zh: ‎可是印加大帝说你是个骗子

translation.en: But he was wrong, it seems.
The men of metal attacked him, and they took everything from him.
translation.zh: ‎金属人袭击了他 夺走了他的一切

translation.en: And, you know? He touched the ground! So now, you can get out, too.
translation.zh: ‎然后你猜怎么着？他脚挨地了 ‎所以你现在也能逃走了

translation.en: Alas, there is no way out of the labyrinth.
translation.zh: ‎哎 这里就像迷宫一般 根本出不去

translation.en: I've been living alone here for so long.
translation.zh: ‎我独身一人待在这里太久了

translation.en: Come, dry off in my chamber.
translation.zh: ‎来 到里屋去把身子擦干

translation.en: thank you for feeding me here in the depths of your belly.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢您让我待在您的腹中 给我食物

translation.en: You know, before they threw me into this hole,
translation.zh: ‎你知道吗？在我被关进这破地方之前

translation.en: I was the Great Observer of the Inca.
translation.zh: ‎我曾是印加帝国的占星大师

translation.en: I worshiped Inti, our sun god.
translation.zh: ‎我曾尊奉因蒂 我们的太阳神

translation.en: I have become the Shadow Gazer.
Grateful for this puma to keep me company.
translation.zh: ‎这头山狮能与我作伴 我心怀感激

translation.en: You'll get used to it in time.
translation.zh: ‎过不了多久 你就会习惯了

translation.en: I don't wanna get used to it. I want to go home with Naïra,
translation.zh: ‎我不想要习惯这一切 ‎我想和奈拉一起回家
‎还有拉米塔、小犰狳和我们的圣物

translation.en: Anger breathes crazy ideas through your head, my boy.
translation.zh: ‎怒火让你神志不清了 孩子

translation.en: I hate the Incas and the men of metal. They're thieves.
translation.zh: ‎我讨厌印加人和金属人 他们是强盗

translation.en: -They want to steal our huaca! -And have you never taken anything
translation.zh:
‎他们想偷走我们的圣物！ ‎难道你就从来没有未经允许
‎擅自拿别人的东西吗？

‎难道你就从来没有未经允许
‎擅自拿别人的东西吗？

translation.en: Forgive me, Great Condor, for taking that feather...
translation.zh: ‎神鹰 原谅我擅自取下那根羽毛

translation.en: and for lying to the shaman.
I know how to get out!
no one can leave the realm of shadows.
The Great Condor is the master of the wind.
Thank you for leading me out of that labyrinth.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你指引我逃离那座迷宫

translation.en: The Great Condor will fly us back to the village.
No! This time, I'm not leaving Lamita!
translation.zh: ‎不！这次我绝不会丢下拉米塔！

translation.en: It's up to you now, Kirkincho!
This is just like in my dream.
Look how beautiful Pachamama is from the sky.
translation.zh: ‎从空中俯瞰 大地母亲多美丽啊

translation.en: The Great Condor is losing its feathers.
Do you think the Great Condor crashed?
translation.zh: ‎你说神鹰会不会摔倒在地了？

translation.en: I don't know, but we don't have much time. The men in metal will be here soon.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 但我们没时间了 ‎金属人很快就来了

translation.en: Here, take the huaca and protect her.
translation.zh: ‎来 你拿着圣物 好好保护它

translation.en: I'll run to the village to alert the shaman and Walumama.
translation.zh:
‎我这就飞奔回村
‎给萨满和瓦鲁嬷嬷报信

translation.en: Think twicing to you, too, Naïra!
I must protect the huaca, so...
translation.zh: ‎我必须保护好圣物 所以…

translation.en: Or hide her... in the cave!
translation.zh: ‎或者把它藏起来 藏到洞穴里！

translation.en: I'm sorry for the bumpy landing.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 刚才降落的时候很是颠簸
‎我们的族人需要你 特普尔派

translation.en: Run to the cave, and bring the huaca back to the ancestors.
translation.zh: ‎快跑去洞穴那里 将圣物还给祖先们
‎特普尔派和你一路吗？ ‎奈拉 特普尔派呢？

translation.en: All of you go hide behind the cacti, quick!
translation.zh: ‎大家都去仙人掌后面躲着 快！

translation.en: The men of metal are coming!
-Where's the shaman? -He left the village to find you.
translation.zh: ‎萨满在哪儿？ ‎他离开村庄去找你了

‎-你没看见他？
‎-没 瓦鲁嬷嬷呢？

translation.en: The snakes are the keepers of our cave.
They can recognize who is ready to appear before our ancestors.
translation.zh: ‎它们能洞悉谁具备了面见祖先的条件

translation.en: -You must trust them. -You must trust them.
translation.zh:
‎-你一定要信任它们
‎-‎你一定要信任它们
‎不 你们不能碰大地母亲的粮槽

translation.en: You have no right to take what's inside of it!
translation.zh: ‎你们没有权利夺走里面的东西！

translation.en: Watch out! They will make the ground shake!
Ancestors, I have brought the huaca back to you.
translation.zh: ‎各位祖先 我将圣物归还于您们

translation.en: I know. But the men of metal are here to attack our village.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 但金属人进犯了我们的村庄
‎我们真的需要您们保护圣物
‎大地母亲永远不会饶恕罪孽

‎-谢谢您 瓦鲁嬷嬷！
‎-谢谢您 瓦鲁嬷嬷！
‎没事了 特普尔派 ‎我们走吧

translation.en: Wow! You're not such a coward, after all! Let's go!
translation.zh: ‎哇 看来你并不是个胆小鬼啊 ‎快走！

translation.en: -Over here! Put it out! -Hurry, we need more!
translation.zh:
‎-这边 快灭火！
‎-抓紧点 再来点水！

translation.en: The fire! It's burning our fields!
translation.zh: ‎这大火把我们的田地都给烧了！

translation.en: Look! The shaman is calling for the rain!
Oh, no! Please, Shaman, don't give up!
translation.zh: ‎不要啊 萨满 拜托您不要放弃

translation.en: The Inca stole all our crops.
translation.zh: ‎印加人夺走了我们所有的庄稼

translation.en: We have nothing left to eat.
And no more seeds to sow.
What are we going to do?
Why are such calamities striking our village?
translation.zh: ‎为何我们村庄会遭受如此灭顶之灾？
‎大地母亲再也听不见我们的祈求了

translation.en: I found these in the huaca.
These three seeds you stored in the huaca
translation.zh: ‎您保存在圣物中的这三颗种子

translation.en: are the last seeds we have left.
May this offering feed your belly.
Tepulpaï and Naïra, our two little saviors.
translation.zh: ‎特普尔派和奈拉是拯救我们的小英雄

translation.en: Tepulpaï, you have grown so much.
translation.zh: ‎特普尔派 你成长了许多

translation.en: I see the Great Condor in you.
translation.zh: ‎我在你身上看到了成为神鹰的潜力

translation.en: Now, dance for Pachamama, little Shaman.
translation.zh: ‎为大地母亲起舞吧 小萨满
